definition: to look exactly like/to be the spitting image of
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: This guy looked like a beaten-up spider-monkey mutant.
sentences.chinese: 这个家伙看起来活像个蓬头垢面的蜘蛛猴变种人。

sentences.english: The fish is so fresh, it is like a fish jumped on the table and cooked itself.
sentences.chinese: 活像是鱼自己跳上桌面瞬间煮熟般鲜美。

sentences.english: He looked just like an old dog  gnawing on a bone.
sentences.chinese: 他看来活像啃骨头的老狗。

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, she looks like the elephant man chewing on a wasp.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，活像个嚼咬黄蜂的大笨象。

sentences.english: Even the eaves were hung on with snow, looking like the fringe of a withe shawl.
sentences.chinese: 连屋檐上也挂满了雪，看来就活像一条白色的花边。

sentences.english: That one sits staring like a mummy.
sentences.chinese: 一个坐在那里傻瞪着眼，活像一座木乃伊。

sentences.english: John looked piteous , like a drowned mouse.
sentences.chinese: 约翰那模样好惨，活像一只落水的老鼠。

sentences.english: Yet here are two nations acting like living caricatures of themselves.
sentences.chinese: 而这两个国家的人却表现得活像他们自己的讽刺漫画。

sentences.english: The nine characteristics really describe a Christ-like life. They are not naturally produced by us.
sentences.chinese: 经文列出的九种特质，正是活像基督的真正写照。

sentences.english: Now you look like an abandoned woman.
sentences.chinese: 你现在难过的样子活像弃妇。

sentences.english: Sometimes at the next jump, looks like a playful baby.
sentences.chinese: 有时会上下跳跃，活像一个俏皮的孩儿。

sentences.english: He flapped after the girls, looking ludicrously bat-like.
sentences.chinese: 他甩着袖子去追两个女孩，那滑稽的模样活像蝙蝠。

sentences.english: Finally, the last rider neared the spot where the old man sat like a snow statue.
sentences.chinese: 老人坐在那里活像个雪人，引颈而望。

sentences.english: Hareton stared up, and scratched his head like a true clown.
sentences.chinese: 哈里顿抬头呆望着，抓抓他的头活像个傻瓜。

sentences.english: He is the image of someone I used to know.
sentences.chinese: 他活像我从前认识的一个人。

sentences.english: The great ship was like a floating building.
sentences.chinese: 那艘巨轮活像一幢浮动的大楼。

definition: seems as if/rather like/Taiwan pr. [si4 de5]
arrogant appearance/smug appearance/to act condescending/to put on airs
with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
